description: History of process/explanation of benefits (EOB) code changes to the claim's service line transaction.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROCESS_CODE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the service level process code that is being added or resolved. This is also sometimes called the claim code or EOB code. This networks to the NPD master file.

columns.name: ADDED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the code was added in the UTC time zone.

columns.name: ADDED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: User who added the service level code

columns.name: ADDED_COMMENT
columns.description: Comment on why the code was added

columns.name: RESOLUTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the code was resolved.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Paid by Other Insurance


Referral Found


No Referral


Change Approved


Change Denied


Superfluous Claim - Not Processed


Previous Claim Erroneous - Use Current Claim


Cleared


Third-party Pricing Completed

columns.name: RESOLUTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the code was resolved in the UTC time zone.

columns.name: ADDED_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the code was added in the local time zone.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the code was resolved in the local time's time zone.
